quotes.message: Winning is not everything, but the effort to win is.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Winning is a state of mind that embraces everything you do.
quotes.name: Bryce Courtenay

quotes.message: Winning isn't everything, but losing is nothing.
quotes.name: Red Symons

quotes.message: Winning isn't getting ahead of others. It's getting ahead of yourself.
quotes.name: Roger Staubach

quotes.message: Don't believe that winning is really everything. It's more important to stand for something.
quotes.name: Lane Kirkland

quotes.message: Winning is everything. The only ones who remember you when you come second are your wife and your dog.
quotes.name: Damon Hill

quotes.message: Winning means being unafraid to lose.
quotes.name: Fran Tarkenton

quotes.message: Winning isn't everything. It's the only thing.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Winning is only half of it. Having fun winning is the other half.
quotes.name: Bum Phillips

quotes.message: Winning may not be everything, but losing has little to recommend it.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: We count on winning. And if we lose, don't beef. And the best way to prevent beefing is - don't lose.
quotes.name: Knute Rockne

quotes.message: The key to winning is poise under stress.
quotes.name: Paul Brown

quotes.message: Winning is nice if you don't lose your integrity in the process.
quotes.name: Arnold Horshak

quotes.message: Winning is great, sure, but if you are really going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.
quotes.name: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.message: Winning isn't everything, but it beats anything that comes in second.
quotes.name: Paul Bryant

quotes.message: Winning doesn't always mean being first. Winning means you're doing better than you've ever done before.
quotes.name: Bonnie Blair

quotes.message: Winning is all in the attitude!
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Winning is a habit.
quotes.name: Leo Durocher

quotes.message: Winning is like shaving - you do it every day or you wind up looking like a bum.
quotes.name: Jack Kemp

quotes.message: Winning is the most important thing in my life, after breathing. Breathing first, winning next.
quotes.name: George Steinbrenner

quotes.message: Winning is really about the DECISIONS you make and the ACTIONS you take as you play the game!
quotes.name: Billy Cox

quotes.message: Winning tastes good.
quotes.name: Jean Claude Killy

quotes.message: Winning becomes easier over time as the cornerstones of confidence become habits.
quotes.name: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.message: The hardest thing about winning is trying to do so without losing something of greater importance.
quotes.name: PETE ABRAMS

quotes.message: Winning is not a sometime thing; It's an all the time thing. You don't win once in a while; you don't do things right once in a while; you do them right all the time.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Winning is the science of being totally prepared.
quotes.name: George Allen

quotes.message: The art of winning in business is in working hard - not taking things too seriously.
quotes.name: Albert Green Hubbard

quotes.message: If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: When it comes to winning, you need the skill and the will.
quotes.name: Frank Tyger

quotes.message: A winning effort begins with preparation.
quotes.name: Joe Gibbs

quotes.message: The determination to win is the better part of winning.
quotes.name: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.message: Winning once can be a fluke; winning twice proves you are the best.
quotes.name: Althea Gibson

quotes.message: What really matters is not just our own winning but helping other people to win, too.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: I am not one of those who think that coming in second or third is winning.
quotes.name: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Winning is something that builds physically and mentally every day that you train and every night that you dream.
quotes.name: Emmitt Smith

quotes.message: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
quotes.name: Alyssa Milano

quotes.message: All right Mister, let me tell you what winning means - you're willing to go longer, work harder, give more than anyone else.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Winning is not always the barometer of getting better.
quotes.name: Tiger Woods

quotes.message: Winning is the most important. Everything is consequence of that.
quotes.name: Ayrton Senna

quotes.message: After winning, most teams become individuals; most teams become complacent.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: The key to winning is choosing to do God's will and loving others with all you've got.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: If winning isn't important, why do we spend all that money on scoreboards
quotes.name: Chuck Coonradt

quotes.message: Develop the winning edge; small differences in your performance can lead to large differences in your results.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The secret to winning is constant, consistent management.
quotes.name: Tom Landry

quotes.message: Don't fight a battle if you don't gain anything by winning.
quotes.name: George S. Patton

quotes.message: Tactics, fitness, stroke ability, adaptability, experience, and sportsmanship are all necessary for winning.
quotes.name: Fred Perry

quotes.message: Winning is a habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Win or lose, playing at all is winning.
quotes.name: Wolfgang Nording

quotes.message: Winning in businesss is great because when companies win, people thrive and grow.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: Winning lifts everyone it touches--it just makes the world a better place.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: Do play to win, rather than simply to compete. Define winning in your context, painting of a brilliant, successful future.
quotes.name: A.G. Lafley

quotes.message: Success is living my life based on purpose.
quotes.name: Malene Barnett

quotes.message: Be authentic. Own your work style and don't ever think you have to change who you are to be successful.
quotes.name: Cheryl Day

quotes.message: The world's successful people are more good and giving than most imagine.
quotes.name: Brendon Burchard

quotes.message: From the word go, those who win the race of success and legacy started with the lifestyle of humility, audacity, integrity, sagacity and prosperity-mentality.
quotes.name: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.message: Every experience you have experienced were necessary to enable you see-through the responsibility in maturity.
quotes.name: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.message: No matter the challenges you are going through, great people went through it and came out of it. You are coming out a success; you are a success.
quotes.name: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.message: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart . Who looks inside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: You build on your successes in life to gain confidence to gain confidence and self-esteem.
quotes.name: Shelley Howe

quotes.message: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Sometimes life is hard. How do you hang on when things seem hopeless? You can tackle your problems as you would climb a mountain.
quotes.name: Andrew Matthews

quotes.message: Through hard times. It puts your life into perspective. It will get you back on track.
quotes.name: Andrew Matthews

quotes.message: Fruitful times are waiting those who are patient in the hard times.
quotes.name: Jonathan H. Wilson

quotes.message: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives neve enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.name: Eric Greitens

quotes.message: Success is completion--accomplishing what we set out to do, whether a task, a call, an errand, or a dream.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: Success is deletion--knowing when not to do, when to say no, when to eliminate habits, methods, or relationships.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: The most joyous part of success is also the most challenging. To create what we want, we need to stop looking back to blame others.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: Success is feeling satisfied and fulfilled by what you choose to do and be on a daily basis.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: Feeling successful is an inner process each one of us needs to learn. To master this process, you need ten skills. Redefining success for yourself while learning to self-acknowledge is the first skill you need to begin leading your life.. skillfully.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: When you think you can't... revisit a previous triumph.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.
quotes.name: T.S Eliot

quotes.message: The spirit, the will to win, and the will to excel are the things that endure. These qualities are so much more important than the events that occur.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Great works are performed not by strength, but by perseverance.
quotes.name: Dr. Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: It doesn't matter what you are thinking, or what fear you have, if you just do it! Action is the only thing that matters... I can see that at the end of my life, I am not going to look back and say, 'I wish I had taken more action'.
quotes.name: Diana von Welanetz Wentworth

quotes.message: People become successful the minute they decide to.
quotes.name: Harvey Mackay

quotes.message: Good things come to those who hustle while they wait.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.message: The fastest way to pass your own expectations is to add passion to your labor.
quotes.name: Mike Litman

quotes.message: To be a champion, you believe in yourself when nobody else will.
quotes.name: Sugar Ray Robinson

quotes.message: Time, patience, and perseverance will accomplish all things.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.message: To be a winner, all you have to give is all you have.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.message: Successful people tend to become more successful because they are always thinking about their successes.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: I have tried 99 times and have failed, but on the 100th time came success.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Success is more attitude than aptitude.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.message: The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
quotes.name: Herbert Kaufman
